SEARCH
Package Data

Class BaseRepository

Object
BaseRepository
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorRepository, DoctorRepository, PatientRepository, PharmacistRepository
public abstract class BaseRepository extends Object
Abstract base class for repository operations. Provides utility methods for managing users, appointments, and IDs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final DataSource
    dataSource
    The data source used for accessing and managing persistent data.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseRepository

      public BaseRepository(DataSource dataSource)
      Constructs a BaseRepository instance with the given data source.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - the data source to be used for data operations.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves the current in-memory data to persistent storage. Delegates to the save method of the DataSource.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the in-memory data by reloading it from persistent storage. Delegates to the update method of the DataSource.

    • findUserById

      public <T> T findUserById(String userId, RoleType role)
      Finds a user by their ID and role type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the user object being returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user.
      role - the role type of the user.
      Returns:
      the user object corresponding to the given ID and role, or null if not found.

    • getAllUsersWithRole

      public <T> Collection<T> getAllUsersWithRole(RoleType role)
      Retrieves all users with a specific role.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the user objects being returned.
      Parameters:
      role - the role type of the users to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a collection of all users with the specified role.

    • getAllAppointmentsFromIds

      public Collection<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsFromIds(Collection<String> appointmentIds)
      Retrieves a collection of appointments based on their IDs.
      Parameters:
      appointmentIds - the collection of appointment IDs to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a collection of appointments corresponding to the provided IDs.

    • getRoleTypeFromUser

      public RoleType getRoleTypeFromUser(User user)
      Determines the RoleType of a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose role type is to be determined.
      Returns:
      the RoleType corresponding to the given user, or RoleType.None if not matched.

    • generateID

      public String generateID()
      Generates a random ID in the format `Abcd-Wxyz-1234-5678`.
      Returns:
      the generated unique ID.
